name: spotifymoodanalyzer
description: * Spotify Authentication: Users can log in with their Spotify accounts to grant access to their listening history.   * Retrieve Recently Listened Songs: Fetches the user's most recently listened to songs from Spotify's API.   * Analyze Mood Using Audio Valence: Utilizes Spotify's audio valence feature to determine the mood of each song.   * Graphical Representation: Displays the user's mood levels over a selected timeframe using interactive charts.   * User-Friendly Interface: Clean and intuitive interface for a seamless user experience.
